trans-unit.source: Include less.js: Includes the client-side LESS compiler (http://lesscss.org/).
File suffixes: Comma seperated list of supported file suffixes for all compiled LESS files.
Page type number: The page.typeNum for including LESS files via page.
Output Formatting: Output formatting controls the indentation of the output CSS.
Preserving Comments: By default, all comments in the source LESS file are stripped when compiling. You might want to keep the /* */ comments in the output though.
